per_frame_1=time2 = time*17;
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.980*time2) + 0.40*sin(1.047*time2) );
per_frame_3=wave_g = wave_g + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.835*time2) + 0.40*sin(1.081*time2) );
per_frame_4=wave_b = wave_b + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.814*time2) + 0.40*sin(1.011*time2) );
per_frame_5=cx = cx + 0.110*( 0.60*sin(0.374*time) + 0.40*sin(0.294*time) );
per_frame_6=cy = cy + 0.110*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.40*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_7=decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%20,0);
per_frame_8=//zoom = 1;
per_frame_9=//warp = 0;
per_frame_10=zoom = zoom + 1.2*(0.01*cos(time*0.317+1) + 0.01*cos(time*0.1132+4));
per_frame_11=rot  = rot  + 0.5*(0.01*cos(time*0.214+3) + 0.01*cos(time*0.2732+2));
per_frame_12=wave_mystery = -0.1 + 0.3*cos(time*0.5*6*17.3214);
per_frame_13=//zoom = zoom + (max(1, bass_att)-1)*0.01;
per_frame_14=dx = dx + 0.01*cos(time*1.613+1) + 0.01*cos(time*2.303+5) ;
per_frame_15=dy = dy + 0.01*sin(time*1.119+3) + 0.01*cos(time*1.784+4) ;
per_pixel_1=rot = cos(rad*9 + time*3)*0.07;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // custom motion for 50% of the pixels...:
warp_4=`    float zoom = 0.84 + 0.05*cos(time*0.5);
warp_5=`    float2 uv2 = (uv_orig - 0.5)*zoom + 0.5;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`    // make every other pixel use 'uv2':
warp_8=`    float2 pix = uv_orig * texsize.xy;
warp_9=`    float even_odd = saturate(2*frac((pix.x + pix.y)*0.5 + 0.25));
warp_10=`    uv = lerp(uv, uv2, even_odd);
warp_11=`
warp_12=`    // sample previous frame
warp_13=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_14=`    
warp_15=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_16=`    //ret = (ret - 0.0015)*0.988;
warp_17=`    ret *= 0.93 + 0.07*saturate(rad*5);
warp_18=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_seaweed;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`uv = uv + 0.01*float2(cos(uv.y*270),sin(uv.x*390));
comp_5=`
comp_6=`    ret = 1.4*pow(saturate(GetBlur1(uv))*((tex2D(sampler_pc_main,uv)-GetBlur3(uv))),0.5); //invert
comp_7=`    //uv.y = rad*rad;
comp_8=`//    float srad = sqrt(rad)+ 0.05;
comp_9=`
comp_10=`//    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_11=`//    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, uv + 0.03*float2(cos(uv.y*27),sin(uv.x*39))).xyz);
comp_12=`
comp_13=`    //ret += GetBlur1(uv) - 0.07;
comp_14=`    //ret *= float3(1.3,0.8,0.5);
comp_15=`    //ret *= 0.8;    
comp_16=`ret = float3(0.9,0.2,0.4)*ret.z + float3(0.2,0.4,0.8)*ret.y;
comp_17=`ret *= 2+sin(bass);
comp_18=`}
